entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow or rain. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
